def Script_Execute (self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Dont rename this function sel = Application.Selection(0) ImmedMode = 0 if Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) == True: ImmedMode = 1 result= Application.ApplyGenOp("ExtractEdgeLoopOp", "", sel, "", ImmedMode, "", "") Application.InspectObj(result)

def Script_Execute (self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Dont rename this function ImmedMode = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) #Is ImmediateMode enabled? curveList = list() for knot in Application.Selection: if knot.Type == "knotSubComponent": curveList.append(knot.SubComponent.Parent3DObject) #Add curve to list of curves Application.SetCurveKnotMultiplicity(knot, 0, ImmedMode)

def Script_Execute (self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Dont rename this function #ImmedMode = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) #Is ImmediateMode enabled? #Application.LogMessage("ImmedMode at start is: " + str(ImmedMode)) knots = list() Sel = Application.Selection for obj in Sel: if obj.Type == "knotSubComponent": knots.append(obj)
#Application.Preferences.SetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode", False ) #NewImmedMode = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) #Is ImmediateMode enabled? #Application.LogMessage ("ImmedMode before applying Op is: " + str(NewImmedMode))
Op = Application.ApplyTopoOp("SetNurbsCrvKnotMultiplicity", knots, 3, "siImmediatetOperation", "") #Result = Application.SetCurveKnotMultiplicity(knots,3,"siPersistentOperation") Application.LogMessage("Created operator: " + str(Op))
Application.InspectObj(Op,"","",4,False)
#Application.AutoInspect(Op)
""" if Result != None:
if ImmedMode == True: #Was the ImmediateMode enabled when operation was started? ReturnVal = Application.InspectObj(Result[0],"","",4,True) if ReturnVal == True: #User has canceled? Application.DeleteObj(Result) else: Application.FreezeModeling(Result) else: #We are not in ImmediateMode, this is simpler... keyState = Application.GetKeyboardState() #Get currently pressed modifier keys (if any) bCtrlDown = keyState[1] == 2 #Is Ctrl pressed? bAutoInspect = Application.GetUserPref( "AutoInspectEnabled" ) if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown==False or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown: Application.InspectObj(Result,"","",1,False)
#except: #pass
#Application.Preferences.SetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode",ImmedMode ) """

#The following code adds a menu item per light in the scene to the bottom of the menu # which selects the respective light (or inspects it when ctrl key is pressed at the same time)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute(self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Don't rename this function! self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the mneu after subsequent calls Lights = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "light", "", True) for oLight in Lights: oLightItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oLightItem.name = oLight.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets):
') Code += "	bCtrlDown = (Application.GetKeyboardState()[1]) == 2
" Code += "	bAutoInspect = Application.GetValue('preferences.Interaction.autoinspect')
" Code += "	if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj("" + oLight.FullName + "");
" Code += ("	else: Application.SelectObj('" + oLight.FullName + "','','');") oLightItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oLightItem)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute(self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Don't rename this function! pass
def QMenu_Menu_Execute (self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass
def QMenu_Menu_Execute (self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass
def QMenu_Menu_Execute(self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass

#The following code adds a menu item per existing camera to the bottom of the menu # which selects the respective camera (or inspects it when ctrl key is pressed at the same time)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute (self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Don't rename this function! self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "camera", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: oCamItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets):
') Code += ('	Application.SelectObj("'+ oCam.FullName + '", "", "")
') Code += ('	bCtrlDown = (Application.GetKeyboardState()[1]) == 2
') Code += ('	bAutoInspect = Application.GetValue("preferences.Interaction.autoinspect")
') Code += ('	if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj("' + oCam.FullName + '.Camera",)') oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute (self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass

QMenu_Menus.QMenu_Menu: def QMenu_Menu_Execute(self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass

def QMenu_Menu_Execute(self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Don't rename this function!
self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "Light", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: if Application.GetValue(oCam.FullName + ".light.Type") == 2: print (oCam.FullName + " is a spotlight") oCamItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets):\n\toVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" )\n') Code+= ('\toView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport")\n') Code += ('\toVM.SetAttributeValue("activecamera:" + oView + "\","' + oCam.FullName + '")\n')
oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)

def QMenu_Menu_Execute(self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets): #Don't rename this function!
self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "Camera", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: oCamItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (self, QMenu_MenuItems, QMenu_Menus, QMenu_MenuSets):\n\toVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" )\n') Code+= ('\toView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport")\n') Code += ('\toVM.SetAttributeValue("activecamera:" + oView + "\","' + oCam.FullName + '")\n')
oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)

QMenu_MenuDisplayContexts.QMenu_MenuDisplayContext: def QMenuContext_Execute(selection, Types, ClassNames, ComponentClassNames, ComponentParents,ComponentParentTypes,ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 0): #Is something selected? Type = Types[0] if Type == "polymsh": #Is the first selected object a Polymesh? return True if ((Type == "edgeSubComponent") or (Type == "pntSubComponent") or (Type == "polySubComponent")): if ComponentParentTypes[0] == "polymsh": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a polymesh? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!
def QMenuContext_Execute(selection, Types, ClassNames, ComponentClassNames, ComponentParents,ComponentParentTypes,ComponentParentClassNames): #Don't rename this function return True

def QMenuContext_Execute(selection, Types, ClassNames, ComponentClassNames, ComponentParents,ComponentParentTypes,ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 0): #Is something selected? if (Types[0] == "pntSubComponent"): if ComponentParentTypes[0] == "polymsh": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a polymesh? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!

def QMenuContext_Execute(selection, Types , ClassNames , ComponentClassNames , ComponentParents , ComponentParentTypes , ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 0): #Is something selected? #Is the first selected object an edge of on a Polymesh? if Types[0] == "edgeSubComponent": #if ComponentParentTypes[0] == "polymsh": return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QMenuContext_Execute(selection, Types, ClassNames, ComponentClassNames, ComponentParents,ComponentParentTypes,ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 0): #Is something selected? #Is the first selected object a polygont on a Polymesh? if Types[0] == "polySubComponent": return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QMenuContext_Execute(selection , Types , ClassNames , ComponentClassNames , ComponentParents , ComponentParentTypes , ComponentParentClassNames ): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 0): #Is something selected? #Is the first selected object a subcurve of a NURBS curve list? if Types[0] == "subcrvSubComponent": return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QMenuContext_Execute(selection , Types , ClassNames , ComponentClassNames , ComponentParents ,ComponentParentTypes , ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 1): #Is something selected? if Types[0] == "polymsh" and Types[1] == "polymsh": #Are the first two selected objects polymeshes? return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QMenuContext_Execute(selection, Types, ClassNames, ComponentClassNames, ComponentParents,ComponentParentTypes,ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 0): #Is something selected? if Types[0] == "polymsh": #Is the first selected object a Polymesh? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!

def QMenuContext_Execute (selection , Types , ClassNames , ComponentClassNames , ComponentParents , ComponentParentTypes , ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 0): #Is something selected? #Is the first selected object a NURBS curvelist? if Types[0] == "crvlist": return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

def QMenuContext_Execute(selection, Types, ClassNames, ComponentClassNames, ComponentParents,ComponentParentTypes,ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 0): #Is something selected? if Types[0] == "crvlist": #Is the first selected object a curve list? return True if ((Types[0] == "knotSubComponent") or (Types[0] == "isopntSubComponent") or (Types[0] == "pntSubComponent") or (Types[0] =="subcrvSubComponent")): if ComponentParentTypes[0] == "crvlist": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a polymesh? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!

def QMenuContext_Execute(selection , Types , ClassNames , ComponentClassNames , ComponentParents , ComponentParentTypes , ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 0): #Is something selected? if Types[0] == "pntSubComponent": if ComponentParentTypes[0] == "crvlist": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a curve list? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!

def QMenuContext_Execute(selection, Types, ClassNames , ComponentClassNames , ComponentParents , ComponentParentTypes , ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 0): #Is something selected? if Types[0] == "isopntSubComponent": if ComponentParentTypes[0] == "crvlist": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a curve list? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!

def QMenuContext_Execute(selection , Types , ClassNames , ComponentClassNames , ComponentParents , ComponentParentTypes , ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 0): #Is something selected? if Types[0] == "knotSubComponent": if ComponentParentTypes[0] == "crvlist": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a curve list? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!

def QMenuContext_Execute(selection, Types, ClassNames, ComponentClassNames, ComponentParents,ComponentParentTypes,ComponentParentClassNames): #This function must not be renamed! if (len(selection) > 1): #Is more than one obj selected? if Types[0] == "crvlist" and Types[1] == "crvlist": #Are the first two selected objects curves? return True #This function must return a boolean! return False

function QMenuContext_Execute(selection, Types, ClassNames, ComponentClassNames, ComponentParents, ComponentParentTypes, ComponentParentClassNames) //This function must not be renamed! { Application.LogMessage("Executing Jscript_Test_DisplayContext") Application.LogMessage(selection) Application.LogMessage(ClassNames) Application.LogMessage(ComponentClassNames) Application.LogMessage(ComponentParents) Application.LogMessage(ComponentParentTypes) Application.LogMessage(ComponentParentClassNames) return true //This function must return a boolean }

Function QMenuContext_Execute(selection, Types, ClassNames, ComponentClassNames, ComponentParents, ComponentParentTypes, ComponentParentClassNames) 'This function must not be renamed! LogMessage("Executing VBScript_Test_DisplayContext") Application.LogMessage(selection) Application.LogMessage(ClassNames) Application.LogMessage(ComponentClassNames) Application.LogMessage(ComponentParents) Application.LogMessage(ComponentParentTypes) Application.LogMessage(ComponentParentClassNames) QMenuContext_Execute = True 'This function must return a boolean end Function
